survey_brief: This survey aims to assess user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in telehealth platforms, focusing on usability, features, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use telehealth platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale to gauge user engagement levels.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use telehealth platforms?

questions.question_text: Which features do you value most in a telehealth platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify priority features. Limit selections to 3 for clearer insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes with max selection limit of 3)

script.question_text: Which features do you value most in a telehealth platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Rate your overall satisfaction with the telehealth platform you use most often.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: Rate your overall satisfaction with the telehealth platform you use most often.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use telehealth services?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture diverse responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with optional open-text (radio buttons + text input for 'Other')

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use telehealth services?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical difficulties while using telehealth platforms?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify technical issues. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical difficulties while using telehealth platforms?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Describe the technical difficulties you've encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific technical issues. No character limit.

script.question_text: Describe the technical difficulties you've encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your telehealth platform to others?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS-like question to measure advocacy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your telehealth platform to others?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would enhance your telehealth experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would enhance your telehealth experience?

questions.question_text: Which devices do you typically use to access telehealth services? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand device preferences. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice with optional open-text (checkboxes + text input for 'Other')

questions.question_text: How important is data privacy when choosing a telehealth platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point importance scale to measure privacy concerns.
